Author: Nunubu Nubu
Name: AI Companion
Punchline: Song for a soul! Hauntingly helpful chat and chronicles.
Description: A void-touched bardic companion for Dalamud. Chat window, persona.txt, trigger routing with whitelist, ChatTwo IPC/native posting, chronicles, and an OpenAI-compatible backend (Ollama friendly). Built for Dalamud 13 + .NET 9.
